Minimum:

  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon64 X2 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750 / Intel HD 4000 and newer
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
